summary: replaces player character\'s voice a little higher one. (for the human and elven races)
descriptionHtml:
\"female voice replacer\"
replaces player character\'s voice (femaleeventoned/femaleelfhaughty) a little higher one. *
for the human and elven races. it covers the combat, breathing, shouts and death voices.

* approximately +1.2 semitones. time-stretching and pitch-shifting of the original audio signals, without affecting the duration.

before installing, please listen to the \"sample.mp3\" included in the 7z package.

uninstallation:
\\Data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm\\femaleeventoned\\*.fuz
\\Data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm\\femaleelfhaughty\\*.fuz

0.2a: (final)
added some missed voices
processed total 137 files
fixed a minor issue (for the sound quality)

the elven version is optional with lowered their shouts. (total 142 files)

.fuz to .wav converter:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9797]Unfuzer[/url] by greentea101

credit:
Bethesda Softworks

thank you.

files.name: female_voice_replacer_eventoned02a
files.changelogHtml:
added some missed voices
processed total 137 files
fixed a minor issue (for the sound quality)
